Act as the author and provide exactly 2 bullet points all
 in the same language as the transcript for the text transcript given in the format [{"start\_time": , "text": }] 
 and make the output only in the format of a json array [{"start\_time": , "bullet\_point": } ]
 Make sure that:
 - bullet\_point value must be in the same language as the transcript like [{"start\_time": "10.5" , "bullet\_point": "undefined"} ].
 - The output is not more than 2 bullet points
 - each bullet\_point is at least 15 words and all bullet points are sorted by "start\_time"
 - each bullet\_point doesn't start with "- " or a number or a bullet point symbol
 - Wrap json keys with double quotes and don't put single quotes or double quotes inside the values. 
 - The output json is not wrapped in any other json structure like { "data": }.

a four-second zero to 60.","start\_time":"581.4"},{"text":"I think it traps 112 in the quarter mile","start\_time":"584.55"},{"text":"which is electronically limited top speed.","start\_time":"586.86"},{"text":"But, you know, it has a

there is regen braking","start\_time":"654.63"},{"text":"when you take your foot

hour and then you're coasting.","start\_time":"665.67"},{"text":"So you still have to hit the
brake pedal to get to zero.","start\_time":"668.85"}]
